name: The Dark Memories of a Blind Past - WebGL Build
name_original: The Dark Memories of a Blind Past - WebGL Build
description:
Hello everyone! 

I'm Doüg!

This is my first game published here, I hope you like it. I made it for B&W Jam.... and the optional theme was:

You only realize the value of something when it's gone...

And I chose to approach this theme by dealing in the game with the diseases of the mind in old people....dementia, madness, insanity, hallucinations, depression, etc...

My biggest inspiration for this game was two characters from two of my favorite Netflix series - Reznikov Galina from Orange is The New Black and Soledad Nunes from Vis a Vis

all this with a character that manages to bring something friendly and a soundtrack made with great care for the game.

I am a Brazilian solo developer and also an independent visual artist. 

PS: Some bugs will still be fixed later like colliders etc...

In advance, I will improve the game to publish in Google PlayStore and on Steam

If you want to support the project to go even further, feel free to give support, and also suggestions.

Visual Art and Development:

Doüg Mattos - Kamo Art Studio & Sid Games

Intro Music and Boss Music made by:
OldWoodStudios - OddSheep

Additional Music and Sound FX provided by:

https://www.zapsplat.com/

Thanks, and Enjoy!
